data.message: So in my graphic design class, our project was to make a teaser movie poster about anything. I decided to make one based on your song "Bad Guy" since I've always wanted a released music video for it (I'm pretty sure you all can agree with me on that). I hope you personally like it Eminem, but I hope you fans like it as well.
